title: Ambedkar Jayanti at Mumbai’s TISS called off as chief guest doesn’t get permission to attend - ThePrint
content:
1. Ambedkar Jayanti at Mumbai’s TISS called off as chief guest doesn’t get permission to attend  ThePrint
  2. LSR Faces BJP Ire Over Event, BJP Neta 'Uninvited For Ambedkar Event, Calls It 'Left Conspiracy'  India Today
  3. LSR College Withdraws Invite To BJP's Guru Prakash On Ambedkar Jayanti As Leftists Voice Dissent  Republic World
  4. LSR students’ body invites BJP spokesperson to speak at Ambedkar Jayanti, then backtracks  The Indian Express
  5. LSR’s leftist students’ body cancels Dalit intellect..Prakash Paswan from speaking at Ambedkar Jayanti event  Firstpost
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: A Dalit students association had invited Ambedkar's great-grandson but the administration said 'outsiders' would not be allowed on campus.
